'''The Marvelous Uses of Nitrogen Fixation''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to cause all [[Dendro Hypostasis#Abilities and Attacks|three Restorative Piths]] to be in an activated state simultaneously. This is done by applying {{Color|Dendro}} and then {{Color|Electro}} to the three Restorative Piths before it revives.
